snippet: An investigation found that a coach had made a homophobic statement to Chris Kluwe, a punter who says he was released over his support of same-sex marriage, but refuted other allegations.
abstract: Minnesota Vikings say six-month investigation has refuted many of the charges made by team’s former punter, Chris Kluwe, who claimed that he was released in 2013 in retaliation for his public support of same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: An investigation found that a coach had made a homophobic statement to Chris Kluwe, a punter who says he was released over his support of same-sex marriage, but refuted other allegations.

headline.main: Vikings Say Report Contradicts Many of Kluwe’s Claims
headline.print_headline: Vikings Say Report Contradicts Many of Kluwe’s Claims

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
